Description: Steatite scarab, elytra marked and humeral callosities present, base inscribed with a cartouche, flanked by uraei, with winged scarab below.
Bibliographic references: Hall 1913 / Catalogue of Egyptian scarabs, etc. in the British Museum (887)
Acquisition name: Purchased through: Sir Ernest A T Wallis Budge
Purchased from: Giza Museum (and other sources)
